conversations.content: Ranzal! Elly! Where are you?!
...Hmm. Looks like we've been separated.
Ugh, I can't believe I overslept. What am I going to do?!
Huh?
Aaah!
Ooof. Oh, wow. Are you okay?
Owww! Watch where you're going!
Er, right. Sorry about that. You aren't hurt, are you?
Huh?! Um...no! No, I think I'm fine.
Well, that's good news, at least. Do you want me to help you up?
Th-thanks. That's very nice of you.
Oh wow, you're handsome... There's such a noble air about you...
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
You're kind of spacing out there. You didn't hit your head or something, did you?
I finally found you... You're my soul mate!
Wait, what?
All this time, I've been on a journey to find my soul mate.
But now my journey is finally over, because I've found who I was looking for!
Ah, I knew it would all pay off in the end... You're everything I dreamed of!
Would you mind maybe filling me in on what's going on?
I get that you were on a journey, but when you say soul mate, you don't literally—
I mean that we're going to get married and live happily ever after! ...Duh-doy.
Get married?!
Of course! My heart is telling me you're the one—AND we met just like I thought we would!
This can only be destiny at work.
So let's start dating! Oh, and planning the wedding, of course. We'll need jesters and a band and bears on unicycles and—
Okay, slow down. You can't just throw something like that at a person. I mean, I don't even KNOW you.
Pffft! Details. We can get to know one another as we go along.
Like, what's your name, for example?
Umm...it's Euden.
Euden, eh?
Ahh, Euden—my knight in shining armor!
Today is such a WONDERFUL day!
Er, I'm not actually a knight so much as a prince. Although I DO have a sword, so maybe that...
Look, we're getting sidetracked. You really shouldn't treat marriage so flippan—
You're a PRINCE?! Eeeeeeeee! You just got a thousand times dreamier!
Oh my gosh, this really IS fate at work! Now let's go, my dear Prince Charming!
Er, go where?
To your house, of course! Or your castle, I suppose, since you're royalty and all.
But wherever you live, just know that I'll be by your side forever.
Will you PLEASE listen to me?!
Hee hee! I wonder when we should hold the ceremony? Fall weddings are nice...
I can hardly wait to be up there on the altar with you. Ahh...
Um, hello? Anyone home?
There you are, my prince!
Are you off again, darling?
Yeah. Some fiends showed up nearby, so I'm off to take care of them.
If we leave them alone, they could end up attacking a village, and that would be a serious problem.
Oh, you're so chivalrous and dashing!  I feel myself falling in love with you all over again.
Oh! Take me! I want to help you!
Sure, you can come if you want.
Oh, thank you! I won't let you down!
Myyyyy priiiiince!
Are you off to beat up monsters today as well, O darling of mine?
I'm actually just walking around the castle to see how everyone's doing.
I want to know if anyone's got anything they're unhappy or worried about. This kind of thing is part of my job just as much as fighting fiends.
Wow! That's so very thoughtful!
Hey, can I come with you? I mean, I don't know if I'll be of any use, but I KNOW I'll be fine company!
Huh? Well...sure, I guess.
Aw, thanks, honey!
Ooh! It's my little princeykins!
What're you doing up and about so late?
...Princeykins? Er, I mean, I'm just... wandering around. What about you?
Oh, I just felt like I'd be able to see you if I came here!
Is there something important you need to do? Can I come with you while you do it?
Well, it's certainly important, but... Um...
Look, you need to at least let me go to the bathroom on my own!
...Huh? That's strange. I don't see my little princey-snookums anywhere.
If you're looking for the prince, he left early this morning.
Ack! Where did he go?!
I haven't the foggiest idea.
Aw, poo. Well, thanks for telling me, Cleo.
I wonder if something made him leave in a hurry? Hmm... Where could he have gone?
Huh? What are you doing on my shoulder, little birdie?
Oh, he flew away...
Wait! I know what this is! That little bird is going to take me to my darling prince!
Waaaait! Hold oooon, Mr. Birdie!
...All right. That's all the deliveries we need to make for now.
Then let's grab some chow and get back already!
Hell, it's barely noon! Dunno why we had to leave so early...
A-actually...I worried I might get found again if I tried to leave any later.
Found? ...Ah. Yer talkin' about Philia.
Yeah, she's kinda like yer shadow lately. No surprise yer tired of it.
I've nothing against her as a person, but...yeah.
I just need time to myself once in a whi—
Daaaarliiiiing!
No... PHILIA?!
I'm so glad I found you! Fate really DOES want us to be together!
How did you even know I was here?! I never told anyone where I was going.
Bwa ha ha! Sucks bein' popular, eh, Euden?
Yer gonna have to accept defeat this time. This gal's just too sharp for ya.
Coincidences can be scary things...
Honestly, what ARE you two talking about? This has nothing to do with being sharp OR coinkidinks!
This is destiny! We are bound by the strongest strings of fate's loom!
Hah! Haaah!
Oh, daaaarliiing... Oh, you were training? I'm so sorry! I didn't mean to disturb you.
It's okay. I was about ready to wrap up for the day anyway.
Oh, then my timing was perfect!
Here, have some water. You must be thirsty.
I am. Thanks.
I'm impressed you knew exactly what to bring me, though. It's like you knew what condition I'd be in when you found me.
Hee hee! I just had a feeling.
You sure are sharp, Philia.
I told you before, this has nothing to do with sharpness! This is fate.
Er, right. Fate.
By the way, there's something I've been meaning to ask you for a while now.
Ooo, this is exciting! It's not often YOU'RE the one asking questions!
Go on, ask me anything! I'll keep no secrets from snumpy-wumpkins!
Well, then...
Is there some reason you're so obsessed with the concept of fate?
Huh? Of course there is!
It all started with a dreamy faerie tale I read when I was a child.
Ever since, I've believed in fate with all my heart and haven't looked back!
A faerie tale, huh? How did it go?
Once upon a time, in a land far away, there lived a handsome young boy and a super-hot girl.
One day, these two perfect strangers bumped into one another in town. Sensing the guiding hand of fate, they IMMEDIATELY fell in love!
Just like we did! Hee!
Umm...sure. So what happened after that?
Oh, there was a big war and they got separated.
Er, is that really how it ends?
Of COURSE not! Have you even READ a faerie tale before?
ANYWAY, after the war, the two of them were drawn together by destiny yet again.
Well, that's a good ending, I guess.
THAT'S NOT THE ENDING!
Maybe you should stop leaving these long pauses in when you tell the stor—
Over and over, the two of them were separated—but every time, they found their way back to each other.
Finally, they got married in a lovely ceremony and lived happily ever after! THE. END. ...For reals, this time.
Well, I'm glad it has a happy ending.
I can see how someone would believe in fate after hearing that.
RIGHT?! Oh, I'm so happy you believe!
Our feelings are mutual! Oh, glorious day!
What?! Hold on a minute. I just said I could understand how someone might—
Well, now that our hearts are finally one, it's time to go and find a place for the special day! We leave at once!
Philia, you REALLY need to pay more attention to what I'm saying.
Is everyone still with us?
I am juuust fine!
I've traveled far and wide— a forest like this is nothing.
Now that's encouragin'. If Cleo was here, she'd probably be complainin' right now.
Well, this IS quite the trek. I'm glad we decided to bring Philia with us.
Anyway, we're almost at the village. Just stick with it a little longer, guys.
Anything you say, sweetie pie!
Grrrrrr!
Aaah! A fiend!
It's fine! One of 'em ain't a threat to us—
Grrrrrr!
What the...?! It can spit smoke?! *cough* Damn it, I can't see a thing!
Oh, there ya are! Take this!
Aaaah! Wh-what are you doing?! You could have seriously hurt me!
It's too dangerous to fight like this. We need to split up and retreat!
Got it!
Whew! I can finally see again.
Now I need to reunite with my prince somehow.
But I'm sure that won't be a problem!
Fate wants us to be together, after all.
No matter how many times we're separated, we'll find one another again—just like the boy and girl in that faerie tale!
Ah! I hear sounds from over there! That must be him!
Oh, daaaarling! I'm so glad to see you aga...aaaain...
Hey there, Philia. How's tricks?
...Wha.
...Huh?
This can't be happening! You aren't my prince!
I guess even yer sixth sense for Euden ain't perfect.
But that doesn't make sense... It HAS to be perfect!
C'mon, it's nothin' to get THAT upset abo— Hey! Behind ya!
Grrrrr!
I-it's that fiend from earlier! No way! I can't get away in ti—
Haaaah!
You okay, Philia?! That was close.
Th-thank you.
Hmm? You're not looking too good. Do you want to have a rest?
Oh... N-no... I'm fine. Really. Sooo...
(Everything's okay. He came for you in the end, didn't he?)
(He's your soul mate, and fate will always find a way to bring you together...)
(...But if he really IS my soul mate, why did I mistake Ranzal for him?)
*sigh*
I hope Philia is okay. She seems down.
Yeah. I'm worried about her, too. She's like that all the time lately.
I can't remember a day she's been normal ever since that fiend caught us off guard in the forest and we had to split up.
I wonder what the cause is, though? I've tried asking her, but she won't tell me.
Eh, folks can be sensitive sometimes. All we can do is try and cheer her up.
I thought the same, which is why we're here in the first place. I mean, she said she wanted to come here, but...
Well, it doesn't seem to be having much of an effect. What should we do?
Say, Philia? Is there anywhere in particular that you want to...
Huh? Where'd she go?
She's gone?! But she was just here!
We need to find her... Philia! Where are you, Philia?!
(I thought I was going to see my prince, but it turned out to be someone else...)
(But if we're really soul mates, how could something like that happen?)
Maybe the threads of fate holding us together aren't as strong as I thought?
...Oh no! I didn't mean to say that out loud.
If my prince hears me saying something like that, he... Huh?
Huh?! Where am I?! Where's my prince...and the others?!
I wasn't paying attention when I was walking, so I don't even know where I am.
But if I go and try to find him and end up finding someone else again instead...
Well, I'll just have to make him find ME!
I'll attach my handkerchief to an arrow, then fire it up into the sky! ...Ha!
I wonder if he'll notice it?
...No! I'm SURE he'll notice! Fate wants us to be together, after all.
I believe in you, my prince...
It's been so long. When is he going to come for me?
It couldn't be that...that fate doesn't...
Oh! M-my prince?!
You lost, li'l lady?
It's not him. Oh, I should have known. This is just the WORST.
Hey, c'mon now! I ain't so bad.
Yer alone, right? Want me to give ya a tour of the town?
No, I do NOT! ...Save me, my prince!
Philia!
Thank goodness I found you! We were all really worried when you vanished!
Well, this was a big waste'a time. See ya.
My prince! You really came for me!
We really are bound together by fate! Otherwise, you wouldn't have noticed my arrow like you did!
That arrow was pretty clever.
Though I only saw it for a moment, and I couldn't be confident it was yours.
Then why did you follow it?
As long as there was even the slightest chance it would lead me to you, that was good enough.
Even the slightest chance...?
...Of course! Hee hee. Of course. What have I been getting so worked up for all this time?
Even if fate isn't as absolute as I thought, that's no reason to give up!
Um, I'm not sure what you're talking about, but does this mean you're feeling better?
Then like I was asking earlier, is there anywhere in this town you want to look a—
Wedding halls!
That was...a very fast answer.
Of course! And look, even if—and this is a BIG if—fate really isn't absolute...
It just means I have to try that much harder to pull us closer together!
Oh! Maybe we should skip looking at halls and just do the ceremony today!
I... No... What?
Oh, is today no good? Then when are you free? Tomorrow? The weekend?
Uh... Umm... Actually, I just remembered I have something to do! Bye!
Waaaait! Come back, my darling prince! Come baaaack!
There's no point in trying to run away! Fate will just keep pulling us together!
